content: कद् {vI.v} {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (कद्यते) To be confounded or confused, to suffer mentally. {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (कदते) also {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To cry, to weep or shed tears. {@--2@} To grieve. {@--3@} To call. {@--4@} To kill or hurt; see कंद्.

कद् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} [कद्-क्विप्] <ab>Ved.</ab> A particle of interrogation, ‘where’. This particle which is a substitute for the word कु is often used as the first member of a <ab>comp.</ab> and expresses the senses of badness, littleness, deterioration, uselessness, defectiveness &c. of anything.
